CustomField.formula: IF(AND(Days_Late__c >0,TEXT(Status__c) <> "On Hold"),IMAGE("/resource/PMT_Status_Images/PMT_warning_60.png","Late",20,20), IF( TEXT(Sign_off_status__c) = "Approved", IMAGE("/resource/PMT_Status_Images/PMT_approval.png","Approved",20,20), CASE( TEXT(Status__c) , "Not Started", IMAGE("/resource/PMT_Status_Images/PMT_routing_offline_60.png","Incomplete",20,20), "In Progress", IMAGE("/resource/PMT_Status_Images/PMT_Clock.png","In Progress",20,20), "On Hold",IMAGE("/resource/PMT_Status_Images/PMT_error_60.png","On Hold",20,20), IMAGE("/resource/PMT_Status_Images/PMT_success_60.png","Closed",20,20))))
CustomField.label: Status Icon
